description: Comprehensive dashboard for monitoring MariaDB/MySQL Galera Cluster and HAProxy load balancer.

panels.description: Shows the number of nodes considered online by HAProxy
panels.title: HAProxy Available Nodes

panels.description: Shows the average response time through HAProxy
panels.title: HAProxy Response Time (ms)

panels.description: Shows individual nodes status in HAProxy
panels.title: HAProxy Server Status

panels.description: Flow control paused time - lower is better. High values indicate replication bottlenecks.
panels.title: Flow Control Paused (lower is better)

panels.description: Shows packets sent and received during Galera replication
panels.title: Replication Packets (per second)

panels.description: Percentage of received transactions that were reapplied locally
panels.title: Apply Efficiency (%)

panels.description: The number of write sets certified for the cluster with respect to local node
panels.title: Certification Dependencies Distance (per sec)

panels.description: Number of queries processed by each node in the cluster
panels.title: MySQL Queries (per second)

panels.description: Number of transactions committed locally by node
panels.title: Local Commits (per second)

panels.description: Number and percentage of transactions aborted (due to conflicts or other issues)
panels.title: Certification Failures (per second)

panels.description: Shows connections through HAProxy to the Galera Cluster
panels.title: HAProxy Connections

panels.description: Average response time for HAProxy backend servers
panels.title: HAProxy Individual Server Response Time (ms)

panels.description: Server selection distribution (shows the load balancing effectiveness)
panels.title: HAProxy Server Selection Distribution

title: Galera Cluster and HAProxy Monitoring
